actions.componentDescription: Infobip is a global communications platform that provide cloud-based messaging and omnichannel communication solutions for businesses.
actions.name: sendSMS

properties.description: Unique ID assigned to the request if messaging multiple recipients or sending multiple messages via a single API request. If not provided, it will be auto-generated and returned in the API response. Typically, used to fetch delivery reports and message logs.
properties.name: bulkId
properties.label: Bulk ID

properties.description: An array of message objects of a single message or multiple messages sent under one bulk ID.
properties.name: messages
properties.label: Messages

items.description: Additional data that can be used for identifying, managing, or monitoring a message. Data included here will also be automatically included in the message Delivery Report.
items.name: callbackData
items.label: Callback data

items.description: Sets specific SMS delivery window outside of which messages won't be delivered. Often, used when there are restrictions on when messages can be sent.
items.name: deliveryTimeWindow
items.label: Delivery time window

properties.description: Days of the week which are included in the delivery time window.
properties.name: days
properties.label: Days

properties.description: The exact time of day to start sending messages. Time is expressed in the UTC time zone. If set, use it together with the to property with minimum 1 hour difference.
properties.name: from
properties.label: From

properties.description: Hour when the time window opens.
properties.name: hour
properties.label: Hour

properties.description: Minute when the time window opens.
properties.name: minute
properties.label: Minute

properties.description: The exact time of day to end sending messages. Time is expressed in the UTC time zone. If set, use it together with the from property with minimum 1 hour difference.
properties.name: to
properties.label: To

properties.description: Hour when the time window closes.
properties.name: hour
properties.label: Hour

properties.description: Minute when the time window closes.
properties.name: minute
properties.label: Minute

items.description: An array of destination objects for where messages are being sent. A valid destination is required.
items.name: destinations
items.label: Destinations

items.description: The ID that uniquely identifies the message sent.
items.name: messageId
items.label: Message id

items.description: Message destination address. Addresses must be in international format
items.name: to
items.label: To

items.description: Allows for sending a flash SMS to automatically appear on recipient devices without interaction. Set to true to enable flash SMS, or leave the default value, false to send a standard SMS.
items.name: flash
items.label: Flash

items.description: The sender ID which can be alphanumeric or numeric (e.g., CompanyName). Make sure you don't exceed character limit.
items.name: from
items.label: From

items.description: The real-time intermediate delivery report containing GSM error codes, messages status, pricing, network and country codes, etc., which will be sent on your callback server.
items.name: intermediateReport
items.label: Intermediate report

properties.description: Language code for the correct character set.
properties.name: languageCode
properties.label: Language code

options.description: Platform select the character set based on message content.
options.label: Autodetect

items.description: The URL on your call back server on to which a delivery report will be sent. The retry cycle for when your URL becomes unavailable uses the following formula: 1min + (1min * retryNumber * retryNumber).
items.name: notifyUrl
items.label: Notify url

items.description: Region-specific parameters, often imposed by local laws. Use this, if country or region that you are sending an SMS to requires additional information.
items.name: regional
items.label: Regional

properties.description: Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) specific parameters required for sending SMS to phone numbers registered in India.
properties.name: indiaDlt
properties.label: India DLT

properties.description: Registered DLT content template ID which matches message you are sending.
properties.name: contentTemplateId
properties.label: Content template ID

properties.description: Your assigned DLT principal entity ID.
properties.name: principalEntityId
properties.label: Principal entity ID

properties.description: IYS regulations specific parameters required for sending promotional SMS to phone numbers registered in Turkey.
properties.name: turkeyIys
properties.label: Turkey IYS

properties.description: Brand code is an ID of the company based on a company VAT number. If not provided in request, default value is used from your Infobip account.
properties.name: brandCode
properties.label: Brand code

properties.description: Recipient Type
properties.name: recipientType
properties.label: Recipient type

properties.description: Use case dependent parameters for sending SMS to phone numbers registered in South Korea.
properties.name: southKorea
properties.label: South Korea

properties.description: Reseller identification code: 9-digit registration number in the business registration certificate for South Korea. Resellers should submit this when sending.
properties.name: resellerCode
properties.label: Reseller code

items.description: Content of the message being sent.
items.name: text
items.label: Text

items.description: The transliteration of your sent message from one script to another. Transliteration is used to replace characters which are not recognized as part of your defaulted alphabet.
items.name: transliteration
items.label: Transliteration

items.description: The message validity period in minutes. When the period expires, it will not be allowed for the message to be sent. Validity period longer than 48h is not supported. Any bigger value will automatically default back to 2880.
items.name: validityPeriod
items.label: Validity period

items.description: Required for entity use in a send request for outbound traffic. Returned in notification events.
items.name: entityId
items.label: Entity id

items.description: Required for application use in a send request for outbound traffic. Returned in notification events.
items.name: applicationId
items.label: Application ID

properties.description: Limits the send speed when sending messages in bulk to deliver messages over a longer period of time. You may wish to use this to allow your systems or agents to handle large amounts of incoming traffic, e.g., if you are expecting recipients to follow through with a call-to-action option from a message you sent. Not setting a send speed limit can overwhelm your resources with incoming traffic.
properties.name: sendingSpeedLimit
properties.label: Sending speed limit

properties.description: The number of messages to be sent per timeUnit. By default, the system sends messages as fast as the infrastructure allows. Use this parameter to adapt sending capacity to your needs. The system is only able to work against its maximum capacity for ambitious message batches.
properties.name: amount
properties.label: Amount

properties.description: The time unit to define when setting a messaging speed limit.
properties.name: timeUnit
properties.label: Time unit

properties.description: Sets up URL shortening and tracking feature. Not compatible with old tracking feature.
properties.name: urlOptions
properties.label: Url options

properties.description: Enable shortening of the URLs within a message. Set this to true, if you want to set up other URL options.
properties.name: shortenUrl
properties.label: Shorten url

properties.description: Enable tracking of short URL clicks within a message: which URL was clicked, how many times, and by whom.
properties.name: trackClicks
properties.label: Track clicks

properties.description: The URL of your callback server on to which the Click report will be sent.
properties.name: trackingUrl
properties.label: Tracking url

properties.description: Remove a protocol, such as https://, from links to shorten a message. Note that some mobiles may not recognize such links as a URL.
properties.name: removeProtocol
properties.label: Remove protocol

properties.description: Select a predefined custom domain to use when generating a short URL.
properties.name: customDomain
properties.label: Custom

properties.description: Sets up tracking parameters to track conversion metrics and type.
properties.name: tracking
properties.label: Tracking

properties.description: Custom base URL for shortened links in messages when tracking URL conversions. Legacy - use urlOptions instead.
properties.name: baseUrl
properties.label: Base URL

properties.description: The process key which uniquely identifies conversion tracking.
properties.name: processKey
properties.label: Process key

properties.description: Sets a custom conversion type naming convention, e.g. ONE_TIME_PIN or SOCIAL_INVITES
properties.name: type
properties.label: Type

properties.description: Set to true to return smsCount in the response. smsCount is the total count of SMS submitted in the request. SMS messages have a character limit and messages longer than that limit will be split into multiple SMS and reflected in the total count of SMS submitted.
properties.name: includeSmsCountInResponse
properties.label: Include SMS count in response

actions.title: Send SMS

actions.componentDescription: Infobip is a global communications platform that provide cloud-based messaging and omnichannel communication solutions for businesses.
actions.name: sendWhatsappTextMessage

properties.description: Registered WhatsApp sender number. Must be in international format and comply with WhatsApp's requirements.
properties.name: from
properties.label: From

properties.description: Message recipient number. Must be in international format.
properties.name: to
properties.label: To

properties.description: The ID that uniquely identifies the message sent.
properties.name: messageId
properties.label: Message ID

properties.description: The content object to build a message that will be sent.
properties.name: content
properties.label: Content

properties.description: Content of the message being sent.
properties.name: text
properties.label: Text

properties.description: Allows for URL preview from within the message. If set to true, the message content must contain a URL starting with https:// or http://.
properties.name: previewUrl
properties.label: Preview URL

properties.description: Custom client data that will be included in a Delivery Report.
properties.name: callbackData
properties.label: Callback data

properties.description: The URL on your callback server to which delivery and seen reports will be sent.
properties.name: notifyUrl
properties.label: Notify URL

properties.description: Sets up URL shortening and tracking feature. Not compatible with old tracking feature.
properties.name: urlOptions
properties.label: URL options

properties.description: Enable shortening of the URLs within a message. Set this to true, if you want to set up other URL options.
properties.name: shortenUrl
properties.label: Shorten URL

properties.description: Enable tracking of short URL clicks within a message: which URL was clicked, how many times, and by whom.
properties.name: trackClicks
properties.label: Track clicks

properties.description: The URL of your callback server on to which the Click report will be sent.
properties.name: trackingUrl
properties.label: Tracking URL

properties.description: Remove a protocol, such as https://, from links to shorten a message. Note that some mobiles may not recognize such links as a URL.
properties.name: removeProtocol
properties.label: Remove protocol

properties.description: Select a predefined custom domain to use when generating a short URL.
properties.name: customDomain
properties.label: Custom domain

properties.description: Required for entity use in a send request for outbound traffic. Returned in notification events.
properties.name: entityId
properties.label: Entity ID

properties.description: Required for application use in a send request for outbound traffic. Returned in notification events.
properties.name: applicationId
properties.label: Application ID

actions.title: Send Whatsapp Text Message

connection.componentDescription: Infobip is a global communications platform that provide cloud-based messaging and omnichannel communication solutions for businesses.

description: Infobip is a global communications platform that provide cloud-based messaging and omnichannel communication solutions for businesses.
name: infobip
title: Infobip
